pages.text: Positive modifiers influence the Vault to the player's $(l)advantage$().$(br2)Which positive modifiers occur during a Vault $(l)can$() be controlled by the player by $(l:game_mechanics/crystal_modification)$(l)modifiying$() the Vault Crystal.

pages.title: Positive Vault Modifiers
pages.text: $(br)These can roll $(l)at random$() within an $(l)unmodified$() Vault.$(br2)Additionally, these can roll on Vaults with Afterlife applied to it.$(br2)Some modifiers may also roll as a consequence of $(l:game_mechanics/crystal_modification#vault_catalysts)$(t:Vault Catalysts)$(l)Vault Catalysts$() applied on a Vault Crystal.

pages.title: Saving Grace Modifiers
pages.text: Saving grace modifiers affect what occurs when the player $(l)unalives$() within Vaults.$(br2)This includes $(l)resurrection$() and $(l)inventory restoration$().$(br2)Unaliving with a saving grace modifier will $(l)lower$() any gear's $(l)durability$(), unless 21 levels above the Vault's level.

pages.title: Loot Modifiers
pages.text: Loot modifiers affect the loot obtained within Vaults.$(br2)$(l)Bonus$() modifiers add $(l)Scattered$() unguarded loot.$(br2)$(l)Cascading$() modifiers increase the number of loot $(l)per loot spawn$() the Vault. The Wooden modifier is an example of this.
